title: 10.	 Other Insurance
sample_text:
If Loss arising from any Claim made against any Insured is 
insured under any other valid policy, prior or current, then 
this policy shall cover such Loss, subject to its limitations, 
conditions, provisions and other terms, only to the extent 
that the amount of such Loss is in excess of the amount of 
payment from such other insurance, whether such other 
insurance is stated to be primary, contributory, excess, 
contingent or otherwise, unless such other insurance is 
written only as specific excess insurance over the Limits 
of Liability provided in this policy.
